publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4003.1# Robin Harper: Supporting Our Local Newspaper Industry—As an amendment to motion (S3M-4003) in the name of Dave Thompson, insert at end ", and opposes any move to abolish the duty on local authorities to print public notices in the local press and national newspapers where appropriate on the basis that this would undermine local democracy and would be a breach of equalities legislation in that people not on the internet would be denied access to important information".
